text: @NikkiHaley @standamericanow This is rich coming from a woman who has ZERO courage when it comes to standing up to Trump. You do nothing as he allows the horrific murder of #JamalKhashoggi, you say nothing when he allows #BountiesForKillingUSTroops, you watch while #TrumpKillsAmericans during #COVID19. STFU
